name: Cooked Ham
description: Original homemade artisan white bread sandwich with delicious cooked ham slices.

name: Ensaladilla
description: The world's most famous sandwich.Made with tender artisan sandwich bread and a soft tuna spread, artichokes,boiled eggs, peas and red peppers.

name: Serrano Ham
description: Artisan white bread sandwich, baked to perfection combined with delicious “Paleta Serrana” ham. This sandwich is one of the first sandwiches prepared in the Plaza del Callao deli.

name: Cheese With Tomato
description: A sandwich that you don't need to eat with anything else. Special sandwich bread, soft cream cheese and tomato.

name: Smoked Fish
description: Bread sandwich and a mix spread prepared with North Sea smoked salmon, boiled eggs, green, onions and capers.

name: Bacon And Egg
description: The softness of our sandwich bread and the unmistakable flavor of crisp bacon and egg.

name: Cesar Salad
description: Rustic lettuce and juicy chicken breast seasoned with Reggiano parmesan cheese, crunchy croutons and authentic Caesar dressing.

name: Mediterranean Salad
description: Fresh rustic lettuce with delicious tuna, hard cooked eggs, natural tomato, black olives

name: Chicken Wrap
description: Delicious wheat crepe with chicken breast and spinach

name: Smoked Salmon Wrap
description: Delicious wheat crepe with smoked salmon

name: Orange Juice
description: We select the best fresh fruit for our 100% freshly squeezed orange juice

name: Carrot And Ginger Smoothie
description: Rich in Vitamin A, which provides benefits for the vision, and its Vitamin C content helps prevent colds and flu.

name: Apple And Cucumber Smoothie
description: Due to is high content of folic acid (Vitamin B9), it promotes cell regeneration. Its mineral composition, calcium, iron and potassium helps in the bone formation and hormone synthesis.

name: Chocolate Milkshake
description: Milkshake made with our traditional gelato, very refreshing and nutritious with a wide variety of flavors. Chocolate, vanilla and red fruits.

name: Strawberry Milkshake
description: Milkshake made with our traditional gelato, very refreshing and nutritious with a wide variety of flavors. Chocolate, vanilla and red fruits.
